description:
Ishikawa battles an empty stomach in the middle of a basketball match. Ishikawa looks for a club to join.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuuketsuki-chan to Kyuugisai / Kyuuketsuki-chan to Bukatsu Tanbou
Li`l Miss Vampire and the Sports Tournament / Li`l Miss Vampire and the Club Search
吸血鬼ちゃんと球技祭 / 吸血鬼ちゃんと部活探訪
